name: test secrets and variables

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: test secrets and variables
        run: |
          echo "Seja bem vindo ${{ vars.NAME }}"
          echo "A senha Ã© ${{ secrets.SENHA }}"
